website_summaries.verdict: Sleek chrome and heavy-duty plastic give your shower a contemporary look. A small hook on one side provides a spot to hang your washcloth, loofah, or razor.
pros: 15 ounces each) for your shampoo, etc
Rust-proof stainless steel with ergonomic push-bar that's easy on your hands
Wide-top bottles are easy to refill
Easy to mount with the included silicone adhesive or screws
cons: Be wary if you use the silicone adhesive: several owners claim it came loose, prompting the dispenser to crash to the shower floor

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: I feel obliged to review these so others don’t have the problem I have. Bought four of the three pump dispensers for my little spin studio showers. They get used three or four times a day so not that different then a household and we don’t use harsh cleansers. The box said they were rust free but they started rusting in just a couple months. Customer service was not very helpful. I guess they know the rust is a problem and are just trying to limit their damage. I would not recommend purchasing these soap dispensers. We have replaced them all with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick to wall and will break into pieces when it falls off the wall.
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to screw through my tiles so I use the supplied sticky tape Followed the instructions to a T. Cleaned surface, held the plate there for awhile and mount the dispensers the next day. Two days later this darn thing fell and broke into pieces. Wasted my shampoo, body soap, and conditioners. Do not buy unless you are willing drill holes.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I used double sided exterior (waterproof) industrial ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I used double sided exterior (waterproof) industrial velcro (like 5 bucks from Home Depot) and it's held since day one. No way it's going to fall and it won't leave marks or drill holes. I installed it and used it 20 minutes after. Filled it up and no leaks. I used dial soap, and semi-thick shampoo and conditioner. No leaks what so ever. Also with the velcro is holds off the wall by about 1/8" which means no mold or build up will occur behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product 1 1/2 years later still so happy buying another
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product for 1 1/2 years. The canister we use for conditioner started to clog once. I emptied the canister, rinsed with warm water, flushed water through, and it continued to work fine -easy. It’s stayed on the wall without issue. The sticky never loosened (and honestly I always thought it would). I did clean the area as directed prior to sticking. I sold the house and I’m buying them for the bathrooms in our new home. Yes, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I almost bought the cheaper versions but kept coming back to simple human as I love the other items I have by them. I wish I had bought it sooner. I use the sticky tape it came with and have had no issues. It’s been up for 8 months now! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: G.McNeal

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Lesson Learned: USE WHAT THEY SEND YOU TO HANG! I tried the marine/outdoor velcro thing and they fell, breaking a lid and spilling an entire container of rather spendy shampoo. :-( I then did as the Instructions recommended and they've been hanging just fine ever since...at least a couple of months thus far. Happily, I didn't hang the kids' yet, so I did as Instructed on those, as well, and they are also still hanging beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: N8vTXN

customer_reviews.title: worse than Humpty Dumpty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and installed it according to the directions. Two days later, all three containers cracked and broke on impact, spilling product everywhere. Returned it on Amazon, they sent another. This time, I added about 2x more of the double-sided tape to the back for additional support. This time it lasted three months before falling off the wall, but somehow the containers didn't break. Rating this one star because it's simply not possible to install with tape only, as they say it is in the instructions. If you're okay with drilling into tile or a tub surround, go for it, it'll be great and look nice. To anyone else, don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to not only help with the bathroom clutter, but to make it easier for my special needs child to wash her own hair and body. It is perfect. I love that the amount that comes out is premeasired and the shampoo doesn’t keep coming out even if the lever is held. It seems very secure on the tile. We did put it up and added silicone on the back and around it just for extra support. I plan to purchase another one for the shower stuff the boys use! I haven’t cleaned it yet so I’m hoping it is easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Lever action feels solid and pumps perfect. Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this addition to our shower. Looks so well made. Lever action feels solid and pumps perfect. Just the right size. Seems pricey but my experience with simplehuman is they stand behind their products warranties. That's important to me. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: chiporter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I made sure the wall was clean and dry. I was careful to pull the paper off the double sided tape. I pressed it hard on the flat shower wall. I waited 24 hrs and filled the 3 containers. 3 hours later and no shower was taken the whole thing crashed to the floor and broken into pieces. The adhesive was either from a bad batch or simply not strong enough to hold the weight. Really glad my daughter wasn’t taking a shower when the happened and cut by the sharp broken pieces of plastic. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Palen

customer_reviews.title: Clutter free and clean shower!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorta obsessed with these! I like a clutter free bath and have in all our showers and homes
customer_reviews.author: Gina Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: Falls off wall
customer_reviews.text: Walked into my bathroom this morning to find my simplehuman triple soap dispenser in pieces shattered on the floor. Amazon’s return window closed Jan 31...only option is to wait and call their service center on a weekday during my work hours. In the meantime all my shampoo, conditioner, and body wash is in the wall mount containers sitting on the floor of my shower because I have no bottles to put them back in. Really unhappy about the product quality for $80.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick to the wall, must drill for it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I was super bummed. This thing just could not stick and hold the weight of the shampoo and conditioner. I read all the reviews and used the tips to use extra sticky stuff. I think the only way it will work is if you can drill into the tile or wall which I really didn’t want to do. I cleaned the area, dried it, used industrial strength sticky adhesives but no luck. Such a bummer because it looked really nice for the hour it stayed up before it fell to the ground and cracked. :( :( :(
customer_reviews.author: Prolificamazonian

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed $75 worth of soap
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I'd listened to the other one star reviews. I purchased this product, followed the instructions for mounting with the glue and adhesive strips, then waited a day to attach the containers. It felt very secure so I filled them with my three very expensive products. I came home that night to find the product smashed into pieces in my tub and about $75 worth of product down the drain. I suppose if you are planning to use the screws to mount this then it may be suitable but DO NOT under any circumstances buy this product if you are planning to use the adhesive method for mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Andynonamous

customer_reviews.title: Favourite Bathroom Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They look great, and no more clutter with shampoo and body wash bottles. I didn’t use the adhesive that came with them, I bought a tube of strong clear silicone from Lowes instead and put plenty of that on to fix it to the tiles. Left it for at last twenty four hours before adding a little more all around the edge for good measure. It’s well and truly fixed on tight and has been in use in my shower for a couple of years now.
customer_reviews.author: BritBitz

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product -
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this diffuser is too heavy when filled with soap. I attached it to my sheetrock wall using the included wall anchors. It pulled the anchors out of the wall and fell to the floor, shattering plastic everywhere and wasting all the soap I had filled it with. I contacted SimpleHuman. They responded a day later asking for photos of the mess, which I had already cleaned up. They did not offer any other help, replacement, or compensation.
customer_reviews.author: djcozmik

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality! The handles ARE solid metal. The rest is quality plastic. Like in 5-star spas and hotels.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Product. Great look and quality! The handles ARE solid metal. The rest is quality plastic. Like in 5-star spas and hotels. Forget the Velcro attachment method described in other review. Just augment the sticky strips supplied with silicone. I attached two systems to granite shower tiles that way. Silicon is cheap, and it's easy to remove if required. You get the intended snug fit that way.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Tigner

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Adhesive Does NOT Work.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions for adhesive-only mount perfectly. No screws but I cleaned surface, wiped it down with alcohol, and waited 48 hours prior to installation. It looked and worked fine for three days. I was just considering the purchase of a second one when I came home to the picture included in this review. Of course I’ve thrown away all packaging. So I’m guessing no return or refund. Oh, and because I’m the sort of idiot who would spend this kind of money on a shampoo dispenser, it goes without saying that I’m the sort of fool who would load it with luxury hair products. That’s about $75 worth of over-priced hair product on my shower floor. Disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Product Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've had these pumps for about 3 months now, and they are working great. I have secured them to the shower liner wall with the adhesive provided, and they have not fallen as others have reported. I have them on the same wall as the shower head, so they are not directly in the stream of the water. They are made of high quality materials, and have a premium look and feel. The pump is nice to use in that it allows for a full range of motion, meaning you can pump only halfway.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy when full to stay on the wall, no matter the adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried these three times with various adhesives up to extreme outdoor velcro and they always manage to fall off the wall, whether one day, one week or one month later...The problem is the weight of the device when full is too heavy for any adhesive. You need something drilled into the wall, which is not what this does. Save yourself the heartache of lost product and cleaning up a giant mess.
customer_reviews.author: Zalla Otten

customer_reviews.title: broken.  lasted only 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: This has fallen off my wall every week and today it finally broke. I only had it less than 3 months. It fell off after the first month and now it won't stay up and it cracked when it hit the ground. Adhesive not good. for the price you would think it would last longer. Willing to change the rating if the company contacts me about the adhesive problem.
customer_reviews.author: shelley kimber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my shower!
customer_reviews.text: From reading through other reviews, I was so afraid that the adhesive wouldn’t hold up. I cleaned the wall really well, wiped it down a few times with the included alcohol pad before I attached the wall piece. I left it on there for 3 days, just to make sure, before I installed the dispensers. I only filled them half way because I was so afraid it wouldn’t hold. Anyway, it’s been a few weeks and it’s still up and I’ve been filling them almost all the way up to the top. So far, so good! No more mess! I just wish I could get another razor holder attachment for my daughter’s razor.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grinins

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: purchased Triple Wall Mount Shower Pump. followed other reviewer suggestions of using industrial strength velcro to install this in my tile shower. i installed this on the wall opposite of my shower head (standard size shower/tub) so it does not get too wet so far, so good (almost 1 year in)! my kids always used WAY too much soap/shampoo when we had bottles. one pull of the lever and they have just the right amount. the containers are easy to refill and look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Use 3m primer 94 1st
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My new shower isn't cluttered with bottles. This is easy to install. Has held up nicely so far. After reading reviews of this adhesive not sticking well I contacted 3M who makes the tape. They recommended prepping porous or rough surfaces with a product called 3M primer 94. I applied the clear primer waited 24 hrs then followed directions for the application of the 3m tape given in the dispenser box. I did not want to drill holes in my shower wall. So far its held great!
customer_reviews.author: kalamazoo

customer_reviews.title: Still hanging on, one month later
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a month to write any review to see if the adhesive would work, and it did. I carefully followed the adhesive instructions on a porcelain tile surface, and one month later, it is still holding strong. The dispensers are also of high quality and look good. I was not willing to drill my shower wall to get the convenience and order of a soap dispenser, so the big question was whether adhesive would work. So far it has.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I own a mobile dog grooming van. I normally carry around gallons of each product, facial, shampoo, conditioner. I bought this with very low expectations, as the environment is wet and messy. I am happy to report that adhesive backing was a solid plus. The construction of the bottles is very hardy. The fact that each one can be removed to be washed on a regular basis is awesome. It works better then I could have though it would. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It looks great and dispenses perfectly. I put shampoo, conditioner and moisturizing lotion in mine. I took time to let the adhesive dry for 24 hours before hanging the bottles in it- just like the instructions said- because my shower tile has a little texture.
customer_reviews.author: madbaker

customer_reviews.title: Not what I envisioned
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but unless you plan to screw it to your shower wall/tile, I can't recommend it. I'm using industrial strenghth mounting tape and industrial strength velcro to mount the device and it won't stay on the wall. Now using heavy gauge fishing line for invisible suspension support, in addition to mounting tape and velcro. Not what i envisioned, but it's staying up....so far.
customer_reviews.author: Junkie Doll

customer_reviews.title: Bad engineering
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Fell off the wall and shattered about 10 hours after its first fill up. Dont trust the VHB folks. Your only reliable option is to drill into the wall with this unit, they shouldn't event offer the VHB option. Drillings wasn't gonna happen on my expensive tile so if you have tile or anything for that matter that you dont want to drill into dont buy this. Also, it would just foam up my dr brokers body wash and not dispense correctly anyways. No product support either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crashed after 4 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar experience that others had, the tape sent with the unit did not hold. I cleaned the area, let the tape "cure" for 24 hours, and after filling the containers and mounting them it stayed up for about 4 hours, then crashed to the floor. The containers did not break, and no product spilled. But, I then was off to Home Depot to get the industrial strength velcro and will try that today. Very disappointed that the tape shipped with the unit seems , in a lot of cases, does not hold with three full containers.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive on the back led to my pump falling twice from the shower area. This led to shampoo, body wash, and facial cleanser that were inside the pumps that I had all recently purchased being dumped onto my bathroom floor. Currently, the pump where my facial cleanser is located is not working properly and it is not an exfoliant with beads. I am extremely disappointed in this product and wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: TY A. ALLISON

customer_reviews.title: Working great and secure so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just put 2 sets up 3 weeks ago in our Airbnb-to-be. So far, so good. Spent some time looking for colored shampoos, conditioners and body washes. Could use more suggestions on those as I"m not 100% happy with ones I bought in bulk. These look great overall. Only suggestion I have is manufacturer should make their labels clearer for each canister saying "shampoo", "conditioner" and "body wash". Very small and see through words at top of canisters are virtually impossible to read, so I had to put my own labels on for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality tape ruins the product
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, as many SimpleHuman products do. But this product is useless. As many users have pointed, the included tape is next to useless. We tried with very large velcro stickers but still no luck. Tried with getting liquid with a very very soft hand, still started to slip and fell in under a week. Has been sitting in a closet now.
customer_reviews.author: amrita

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. Has to be drilled into the tile
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. I previously ordered and received the item as advertised here and I used the double sided tape and suction cups to adhere it to the tiles in the shower. My most recent order came and it was not able to be adhered using double sided tape or suction cups. They weren’t included and the design of the item that arrives couldn’t use them even if I bought my own the item that arrived has to be drilled into the wall which of course is no use at all because no one wants to be drilling through their shower tile walls.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product for guest who host their home.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Airbnb and very well built metal design. Use a light soap, not heavy and you’ll get good life out of this product. Only issue what the mounting kit. Either you drill or use better double back tape with a good liquid adhesive combo. Otherwise you’ll be picking it up off the floor in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Tim DeLong

customer_reviews.title: IT WILL FALL OFF WALL
customer_reviews.text: Installed per instructions in June in our new shower, very nice dispenser, fell off wall and broke in December. None of the 5 year warranty covers mounting adhesive on back plate, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work on tile
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Simple Human products, but this one didnt work. Had to use the tape, waited 48 hours and it fell down in less than 24 hours after 2 uses and only filling the bottle half way....
customer_reviews.author: A guy

customer_reviews.title: Double stick tape doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but fell off the wall after a week, so you have to screw it to the wall which will damage your tile. The descriptions (soap conditioner shampoo) are clear so they are impossible to read. One of the pumps did not work, but they sent a replacement right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Van Gaasbeek

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but.......
customer_reviews.text: Scrubbed my shower wall with bleach, wiped it dry, waited about half an hour, and stuck this onto the tile wall. About 10 minutes later it fell off the wall. The sticky back does not hold this to the wall. I had to drill holes into the wall mount, drill my tile, insert plastic plugs, then screw this to the wall. Other than that, it looks great and dispenses shampoo, body wash, and conditioner great.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Boyko

customer_reviews.title: Falls off the shower wall, repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this product. That you can eliminate all of the plastic bottles in your shower. We installed this product 3 times and it fell off the wall three times, once waking us up in the middle of the night. It simply does not stick to the wall with the adhesive provided (which we tried twice) and with our own adhesive. I had hoped to return the product, but I see it's too late. $70 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: mich25

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: Whatever problems they were having with handles breaking off looks to have been solved. The levers you pull to dispense the soap are now metal and the whole enterprise feels very tight. The glue to hold the assembly to the wall worked perfectly and there isn't a hint of movement meaning that everything is solid just the way you'd want it to. I'm assuming if I every need to get rid of the thing for some reason I can peel the goop off the tile without any damage. Much nicer than having to had use screws. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Edelman

customer_reviews.title: Hundreds of dollars in damage and lost product
customer_reviews.text: This unit was perfect for about a month. One day it failed and came crashing down sending shards of plastic everywhere and damaging my shower. To say I am livid with this company would be an understatement. I now have to have my shower resurfaced and replace all the lost product. THIS THING IS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Denise DC

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to some of the reviews, bought this product, the adhesive did not hold, it fell the next day after installation and it broke and shattered. I l lost all of my expensive products. sending back for refund, broken and all. I also sent the manufacturer an email telling them they need to fix this issue or tell customers that this needs to be hung with screws not adhesive tape.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Leites

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to use compound to stick this up on the wall because that adhesive will hold literally nothing. But I love these! I bought these for my RV because I wanted to conserve space and these are the perfect size. I’ve had it for a little over a week now and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylin

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: One year later and this thing is still holding strong. We have always hated the clutter in the shower and on tub ledges. This has been a game changer as far as keeping things clean, tidy, and organized. Plan to put these in all showers going forward
customer_reviews.author: Nick Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product may buy another one for our guest bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, quality is great, especially like the clear containers which have a silicone o ring on lid which gives a great deal but not too difficult to get off
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work from the start
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. The first time we filled it up, it didn't work at all. Full of soap, simple soap, not anything thick or with any texture, and it does not pump out anything. What an expensive and ugly shower wall decoration I have bought...
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Use anchors to mount.
customer_reviews.text: High quality design, everything I’ve xome to expect from a simple human product. For those who have issues with it, I suggest you pay someone to properly mount with anchors. I wouldn’t suggest mounting this with any sort of glue / adhesive / Velcro, due to the weight of the unit while in use along with the constant moisture it will be exposed to. If you’re willing to spend $70 on this, and your not handy or have the tools, you should probably spend $70 to have someone properly install it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wait 24 hours to fill
customer_reviews.text: Installed as directed but crashed to the shower floor within first week of use, lost product down the drain and broke one of the lids. Customer service was nice. They are sending replacement parts. Recommended screwing to wall but do not want to put holes in the new shower wall tile. Advised me to try to install again and wait at least 24 hours before filling units. This advice is not included in the installation instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Garlinghouse

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this purchase. No matter what we have tried the dispenser falls off the shower wall. We even purchased an industrial adhesive and the dispenser still ended up on the shower floor within a week. Don't buy! I total waste of $70 not to mention how much product you loose when the items shatters.
customer_reviews.author: KB5280

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and the overall quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the overall quality and functionality. However, I am a bit perplexed by the tiny translucent print for shampoo, conditioner and body wash on each plastic cannister. We ended up having to write the type of product in permanent marker on each dispenser so our renters knew what they were using which took away from the clean look of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Printz

customer_reviews.title: Bad mount design
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept but would not stick to brand new tile for very long fell after a few days even after I cleaned with rubbing alcohol. Reinstalled with double sided gorilla tape and then still fell.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great shower dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! So much sturdier than I had expected. The reservoirs are heavy duty gauge plastic and the levers work smoothly and dispense controlled amounts without drippage. I wasn’t sure the cost would be worth it, but I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: WiscNurse

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for a small bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a double wall mount from the container store, the alcohol pad was expired. It fell the first night. Purchased this triple mount from amazon, everything fresh, still stuck on the wall. I would definitely screw it in. I would recommend mounting it far from the water source. Great to have less bottles and clutter in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed 😕
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I love Simple Human products, I have quite a few. I woke up this morning to this mess you see in the pictures. A lot of expensive product was wasted when this fell off the wall for no apparent reason. The fall also shattered parts of the acrylic vessels so there is zero redemption. I was liking the space saving it provided, but the adhesive did not hold... and yes I followed the directions word for word...I would return it but of course I am just outside the window to return. I only had this up for 4 weeks, so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Fell off the wall and broke. And we even used better mounting tape and silicon Glue to attach it.
customer_reviews.text: Do not attach this item with the double sided tape that is included in the product. The item is simply too heavy, when filled for any kind of tape to hold it in place. We used VHB tape, properly cleaned the surface and used silicon glue, waited 2 days for everything to cure. It lasted 3 days and the seperated from the wall, fell and broke the clear cylinders and caps. I WOULD ONLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM IF YOU INTEND TO USE FASTENERS DRILLED IN TO THE WALL TO ATTACH IT. Otherwise you are taking your chances that it will fall and break.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan113

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I installed this dispenser on a new marble shower wall with the sticky tape enclosed and I followed the directions exactly. Two days after us, it fell off the wall and one of the dispensers broke. We were very disappointed in this product and wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and we love it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! What a great looking and space saving way to hold your shampoos and washes. My husband when grouting the shower nailed this into the grout. Then he only used the very sticky backing and once grout dries he caulked. It is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and clean looking
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get this product for guests and sitters in the guest bathrooms while we are away. It's been up for a full week and used maybe 5 times already. So far this product is great and easy to install. It holds about 1 bottle of regular sized shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. It's amazing! I would recommend it for anyone who doesn't want a wire hanger or a shelf in their tub/shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good quality only buy if you plan on drilling holes
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product. I have purchased three of these. The containers hold a lot of product and is a well made and very sturdy if you use screws. In my opinion it is way too heavy especially with it full of product to hold with the adhesion they give you. The other problem is they do not provide screws or wall anchors. If you are looking for an adhesive dispenser look at the Euro dispenser it sells for $20.00 and is very light weight and holds well to tile walls. I would have given 5 stars if they would have provided screws and wall anchors and left the worthless adhesion in the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT Canisters not assembled properly LEAKY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good, holds to the shower good, but the individual canisters are not assembled properly and leaks. It is constantly leaking in 2/3 canisters and all purely smooth (non-abrasive) products!!! I would highly discourage purchasing this because once its open and used, it's not returnable, but you would never know its a crappy and leaky product until you use it!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM! I will try to add a photo as well so you can see for yourself how cheaply made this is.
customer_reviews.author: sierra west

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for the weight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from a friend's recommendation. It is a beautiful item and I followed instructions exactly to install on my flat, non porous tile. I even let it dry over 24 hours before adding the 3 dispensers. The next day it was found to have fallen and I lost about $40 worth of shampoo, conditioner & body wash.
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Do not use it with the 3M if you want to use it for the shower. Install it using the screws
customer_reviews.author: Andrea martinez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! DO NOT BUY! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this product. I filled up my 3 pumps with my shower liquids (very expensive by the way), and within 20 minutes everything fell down, the containers cracked, and my liquids ran down the drain. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not for the clumsy
customer_reviews.text: After a few years of use I can report: these pumps are a great way to clear the clutter from your shower. They look great and perform as expected. These containers won't last as long if you share your shower with somebody clumsy like myself. Each container is only pushed-in and snapped into place. I have knocked a couple of these from their mounts with my elbow while showering. Breaking the clear plastic top in the process. Also, I recently tore off the pump action handle on another. The little handles are actually made of plastic. To be fair, customer service at simplehuman has been awesome. They replaced one of the containers when it was still new.
customer_reviews.author: Till808

customer_reviews.title: Use additional glue!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I requested a replacement dispenser and I received it quickly and free of charge. Updating to four stars. Product fell and broke after only one day. Should’ve read the reviews about using additional silicone gel. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Reina

customer_reviews.title: Good dispenser, but brakes fast
customer_reviews.text: As the previous consumer described, this is a nice design, rich looking dispenser. The real problem is that the plustic T-bar you pull to dispense soap is made of plastic and it breaks frequently. Over one year I had to replace 3 of them that adds up ($26 for a single one to replace a broken one). We have two of triple sets in each of our bathroom and each suffered the same problem. SimpleHuman, add please a metal T-bar handle finally!!!THis is faulty design and lack of testing on their behalf. Otherwise, good product ( before handle brakes) .
customer_reviews.author: FL Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Drill holes to hang; don't bother with tape or Velcro!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Quality made. But despite following directions to hang in shower using the tape provided by manufacturer, it came crashing down a week later. I even then tried the expensive Home Depot industrial strength water resistant Velcro other buyers recommended....again it came crashing down. Finally hired a handyman with a masonary bit to drill holes in my brand new shower tile--it has been hanging for 2 weeks so hopefully third time is a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harris

customer_reviews.title: I finally purchased this item after looking for many months.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second simplehuman product. An excellent brand. I was very concerned about the weight of three bottles of shampoo and didn't buy it immediately. I instead shopped for products from other companies. From the product descriptions I read, it appeared to be a glue only installation method. It does allow for a concealed screw attachment as well. I actually used the silicone glue and screws; screws for support and silicone to seal against the tile. It removes clutter, it provides a consistently measured amount, and it loads easily. I wish I read the product information more clearly, as I would have purchased this item a year ago. There is no downside to this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Get your drill ready!
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea. But who ever thought 3M tape or Nano tape (tried both!) would hold this with the Dispensers full is wrong! You will definitely need to screw it in! Additionally, the mount should be metal. Instead it's plastic & cheap.
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and worth the money. Must be secured properly to wall or will fall and break. Heavy when filled with product. Can purchase replacement parts on company website instead of repurchasing a broken unit
customer_reviews.author: Sue Houston

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. So much so, that I bought a second one for the guest shower. Easy to install. Sturdy. Soap comes out easily with no dripping. Easily to refill.
customer_reviews.author: KellyRae

customer_reviews.title: Big Thunderous Crash in the Middle of the Night
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted one of these for a long time and finally purchased this product early May 2020. Last night, 6/24/2020, it came crashing down in the middle of the night. I use really good shampoo that’s not cheap, so $200 worth of hair product and body wash down the drain. I had the dispenser placed on the opposite side of the faucet, where water does not reach and we have a vent fan above the shower. You might want to rethink purchasing this if you can’t drill into the wall. Super sad and frustrated at the waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for our small B and B. Used the adhesive to tile and did not want to drill into the tile. After a week, it was too wet and fell. Two of the plastic reservoirs cracked and would not hold liquid. Customer Service asked simply for a few pictures of the damage and sent out replacements. Great sturdy product - when mounted correctly, and great Customer Service backing it up. Please note we live in Hawaii and it was simply very humid and our rooms are not environmentally controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive Failure
customer_reviews.text: After being installed for a mere 3 weeks, the adhesive failed and caused the mount and dispensers to fall about 5 feet, but resulted in no apparent damage other than a torn adhesive. If you're going to buy this, probably screw it into place instead if you're okay with driving holes into the wall of your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved the first one I bought and mounted with screws ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first one I bought and mounted with screws in my newly refinished bathroom, when two dispensers broke, the only option was to repurchase the entire mounting device. I have the one extras stashed away for when needed as a replacement. Beautiful design and great for keeping bath clear of clutter, but too heavy to mount without screwing into wall. In my case, not looking forward to what happens when it is out of stock. UGH
customer_reviews.author: FedGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our shower. Pretty easy to install, looks good and functions nicely. Was nervous about using just the adhesive tape due to weight of full liquids, so I also used anchors to help support as well as caulk around edges.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Loflin

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied. Now this sentence repeated to make my comment ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the three leaked just a bit with a thin Palmolive dish soap liquid in it, but with more thick shampoo and hair conditioner no problem. Palmolive is very non uniform in viscosity. I may leave the top open for it to dry out just a bit, and that will fix it, but is is not a big problem. Products came as promised and very fast. I am very satisfied. Now this sentence repeated to make my comment even longer, because I am too busy to write more just to please Amazon. Products came as promised and very fast. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Verryl F.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 now and I can't tell you how many empty shampoo bottles I've had to replace as he would accidentally leave them unopened and tipped over in the bath or shower. I also got tired of finding little soap pieces around the tub. Now that I have these Simplehuman pumps, there is no more waste, and the product works very well. Just one pump gives you the right amount of shampoo, conditioner, or soap. Very clean and mechanically works great as there is no leakage. Plus they look great too! I bought a set of three for my son but after seeing how great they worked I bought a set for my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: MUST be screwed into the wall! Adhesive is insufficient
customer_reviews.text: Must be screwed into the wall! We first used the adhesive and, even though we had a perfectly flat surface and followed all of the directions, the entire thing fell down after a few weeks. (Fortunately it didn't break when it fell!) Now that we've replaced the adhesive with screws, it's great. Five stars--provided you're going to drill holes and screw it into the wall. One star if you're planning to use the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: ABC123

customer_reviews.title: Simple arthritis solution
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandmother who had trouble accessing her products in the shower. She has had to use “hotel” mini shampoos and soaps because she can’t open the big ones. She insisted she didn’t want me to get her anything but now she has had to admit they make her life much easier. This was incredibly easy to install and now other family members are reaching out asking where I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this product, as we just moved to a new home and installed it in our new shower which is completely tiled. It adheres very well with no screws needed. The first purchased one is nearly 3 years old and still adheres well -- no looseness at all! I love the convenience and great looks. So much nicer than having ugly shampoo bottles to look at and deal with. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: Who the manufacturer is so I can get my money back.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terribly designed. The adhesive is at the bottom, should have been at the top. After one week it came off, crashed and broke wasting all the expensive products. $80 down the drain, literally. DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT, WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: james rickson

customer_reviews.title: High quality, sturdy, and very functional.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's shower, and it worked so well that we ordered one for our shower too. The quality is excellent and it was very easy to install. It dispenses well and is easy to refill. We love that is reduces the bottle clutter, looks nice, and is sturdy. It shipped fast, was extremely well packaged, and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on shower wall.
customer_reviews.text: At first everything seem to find. Then about a couple weeks later it crashes to the floor of the shower with about $40 worth of soap product inside of it. Which is of course mostly gone now. Not to mention that when you fill it up the caps on the top don’t completely shut. They keep popping open. Aside from that aesthetically they look great they do pump soap. They just don’t stay walls or close properly.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is horrible... Don’t buy unless you plan on screw mounting it
customer_reviews.text: This has been in my shower for approximately 3-4 months. I hung using the 3M adhesive. Today, without warning, it fell and one of the cylinders shattered redoing my shower floor with sharp shards of plastic. When I inspected the mounting mechanism, then he serves had literally dissolved. I have no idea how this happened or why this happened. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marshall

customer_reviews.title: cheap product, bad company support
customer_reviews.text: While installing one of the cheap plastic lids popped off and broke when it landed on the shower floor. Inevitable that this will happen during the lifespan of the product while cleaning and filling it. Worst part was when I contacted the company, there response 4 days later was "here is the link for you to buy a new lid." Poor quality product at a premium price. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stover

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two months ago. I was really happy about how it looked. However, the other day when I walked into the bathroom the whole thing was lying on the floor, broken. It's very frustrating since it wasn't cheap. UPDATE: I talked to their customer service and send them pictures of the broken product. They immediately sent me a replacement without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Permanently mount with hardware not adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Product awesome until adhesive failed, left with broken expensive mess of shattered parts and high end personal care products.
customer_reviews.author: PJH58

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Quality! Use screws to secure not the adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Looks upscale, beautiful, and organized. Really need to screw into the wall to keep secure. Was able to screw between tiles without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a second one after the first fell off the wall and smashed on the shower floor. Just opened the second box with the intention of screwing this one to the wall - it's obviously one that was already returned - it's missing the screws, accesory hook and the lids.
customer_reviews.author: karen o'halloran

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Bought This Years Ago!
customer_reviews.text: Using this triple-soap dispenser, I've cut my costs, reduced loss, and streamlined shower time. The unit was easy to install, and the sticky strips on the back work perfectly. [I had my doubts when I first hung it and let it sit for 24 hours to "cure".] It's easy to fill the dispensers from the top without removing them, but you can remove them to clean them if you're changing brands or scents of soap. The pull levers on the bottom work flawlessly and have not clogged yet after about three months of daily use. The razor holder (optional) surprisingly holds a razor securely and is easy to detach and use and replace.
customer_reviews.author: B. SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: I used a few dabs of silicone to augment tape but it's a sturdy mount. Dispensing shampoo conditioner and body wash. Dispenses perfectly. Should be sold with two books. Cost me less than $2 to order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice with a couple small issues
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They hold a good amount and look good. What keeps it out of five stars is the fact that the containers tend to wiggle one way or another, making it hard to make each nicely parallel. One of the containers that has my soap in it has a sticky pump handle already (four months of usage)
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product otherwise though
customer_reviews.text: One of the chambers has water sitting at the top from water getting into it. May need to some rigging. Great product otherwise though! I'm not sure what people were complaining about with it not mounting securely.
customer_reviews.author: marinefam

customer_reviews.title: Great for small bathrooms! :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our apartment bathroom since we had so much stuff on our previous rack it would attack us mid shower... despite the hard water buildup, these pumps have stayed up no problem for a month so far. 10/10 Great to save space, the adhesive is awesome, and they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rosman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dispensers. To those that had them fall. You apply the silicone around the edges and in between and around but not on the adhesive strips. The adhesive will hold it in place and then let the silicone sit at least 24 hrs before using or filling the containers. I have two of these and they are staying up just fine 3 weeks after install and they look and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Whistler

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Applied according to direction Fell off wall and broke Difficult to put side “buttons” on
customer_reviews.author: little flower mama

customer_reviews.title: BROKE DE FIRST DAY!!!! Fell off in 1 day and crash completely. I lost money!
customer_reviews.text: Fell off in 1 day and crashed. I lost money in soap. shampoo and conditioners. Please Simplehuman, SELL ONLY THOSE WHO WANT THIS PRODUCT FOR USE SCREWS into the wall. It is impossible to hold the weight with glue and double sided tape. To sell lies,you are down a product that seems to be very good. Sorry but I could not enjoy it. I WOULD ONLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM IF YOU INTEND TO USE FASTENERS DRILLED IN TO THE WALL TO ATTACH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Morales

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to keep it staying on without screwing in
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this in my apartment shower which doesn't have regular tile walls. No matter how hard I tried, the whole thing would eventually fall off and drop everything on the ground. I tried on the glass shower door and no luck either. I obviously cannot screw anything in. Essentially a useless waste of money unless you can screw into your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Bulkin

The ergonomic t-bar lever works with your natural grip for precise, one-handed dispensing, and removable hooks hold a razor, loofah, or other accessories. Easy to install with double-sided tape.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.

EASY TO INSTALL - Installs easily with double-sided tape.
WIDE OPENING - Makes refills fast, easy, and spill-free.
EASY TO CLEAN - Dispenser lifts off wall plate for easy cleaning or refill.
